item.title: Oberon Day is March 28, 2011
item.description: Bell's Brewery releases Oberon, their summer beer, on March 28, 2011. The event is marked by the annual Michigan celebration of the hope that the winter is finally behind us and baseball is about to start. Here are some details on how to get Oberon near you, if you happen to be near one of the places mentioned in this list; this is not a complete list, but their web site will let you find more.
